content.rendered:
As you may have expected, the First Round event in New York on May 8, has been affected by the Corona Virus as it will be too soon to hold an event that puts 900 people in close proximity and we do not feel comfortable at all putting anyone in that situation.

We are delighted, however, to announce that we were able to very quickly secure a new date in the same venue for this fall and have re-confirmed the participation of ALL the speakers.

The new event date will be September 25, 2020 at the Tribeca Performing Arts Center.

Early-bird pricing will be loooooong, ending on August 7. We have reduced our cancellation policy from $25 to $5 (to cover credit card transaction fees which are not refunded to us, which is not a problem typically but with the potential of hundreds of cancellations we could take a significant financial hit.)

As has been the case so far, we will keep adapting to whatever keeps happening in these crazy times.
